text: An afeziam arazir kabagh amir puvatɨ, otarim uabɨra arazir kabagh ami. A mɨghsɨabar pɨn itir aseba famin danganibar ghua da bagha ofa gamir dagheba api. Egha gumazir igharazibar amuiba koma akui. Egha dagher me aser marvir guaba bagha ofa gamiziba apava gumazir igharazibar amiba ko arazir kurar kɨ aghuazibagh ami.
